wikipedia_page.main: Charles Church (born 17 December 1970) is a British painter best known for his portraits of racehorses.

response: * Charles Church (businessman) (c.1944–1989), British businessman and Spitfire enthusiast who co-founded Charles Church Developments
* Charles Church, Plymouth, a ruined church and war memorial, Devon, England
* Charles Church Developments, British upmarket housebuilding company which is now a subsidiary of Persimmon plc
